paragraphs.text: The Future Industries airship is a sleek mode of transportation.

paragraphs.body: The Future Industries airship is a large, metal, zeppelin-like vehicle employed by ${link_0} to travel throughout the ${link_1} in search of new ${link_2} after the events of ${link_3}. It is manufactured by ${link_4} and piloted by an ${link_5}.
paragraphs.text: The Future Industries airship is a large, metal, zeppelin-like vehicle employed by Team Avatar to travel throughout the Earth Kingdom in search of new airbenders after the events of Harmonic Convergence. It is manufactured by Future Industries and piloted by an engineer.

paragraphs.body: ${link_0} arrived in the evening at ${link_1} with the Future Industries airship in tow, suggesting that Team Avatar use it to "travel in style" when heading toward ${link_2}.
paragraphs.text: Asami Sato arrived in the evening at Air Temple Island with the Future Industries airship in tow, suggesting that Team Avatar use it to "travel in style" when heading toward Ba Sing Se.

paragraphs.body: During the journey throughout the Earth Kingdom, the Future Industries airship took Team Avatar to various places where sightings of new airbenders were reported, though many were unwilling to leave their previous lives behind except for ${link_0}. While in the air, the spacious deck provided ample room for ${link_1} and Kai to exercise and learn the basics of their newfound bending ability.
paragraphs.text: During the journey throughout the Earth Kingdom, the Future Industries airship took Team Avatar to various places where sightings of new airbenders were reported, though many were unwilling to leave their previous lives behind except for Kai. While in the air, the spacious deck provided ample room for Bumi and Kai to exercise and learn the basics of their newfound bending ability.

paragraphs.body: After arriving in Ba Sing Se, Korra and Asami used the airship to travel to a town outside the capital to collect ${link_0} ${link_1}'s tax revenues under the monarch's orders.
paragraphs.text: After arriving in Ba Sing Se, Korra and Asami used the airship to travel to a town outside the capital to collect Earth Queen Hou-Ting's tax revenues under the monarch's orders.

paragraphs.body: The next night, Asami used the airship, alongside ${link_0}'s, to rescue captive airbenders from the Earth Queen before making a clean getaway. Once they were far from Ba Sing Se, ${link_1}, Bumi, and ${link_2} took the airship to bring the airbenders to the ${link_3}.
paragraphs.text: The next night, Asami used the airship, alongside Lin Beifong's, to rescue captive airbenders from the Earth Queen before making a clean getaway. Once they were far from Ba Sing Se, Tenzin, Bumi, and Jinora took the airship to bring the airbenders to the Northern Air Temple.

paragraphs.body: The spacious cockpit gives way to the bowels of the ship, which holds a wooden table for eight people and four white sofas.
paragraphs.text: The spacious cockpit gives way to the bowels of the ship, which holds a wooden table for eight people and four white sofas.

paragraphs.body: The design of this aircraft is roughly similar to the ${link_0} used during the final stages of the ${link_1}, as well as the ${link_2} used by ${link_3}'s ${link_4}, though it is more luxurious in appearance. The vessel is constructed primarily from metal and employs multiple propeller sets to move. It is unique in its impressive size: a ${link_5} is capable of comfortably staying on board with little-to-no effect on its speed. The size of the ship also allows the passengers to travel in comfort as it sports an impressive galley with high ceilings and a deck atop the ship with enough room for two airbenders to duel without much risk of falling overboard. The bow features a phoenix statue mounted on it.
paragraphs.text: The design of this aircraft is roughly similar to the Fire Nation airships used during the final stages of the Hundred Year War, as well as the police airship used by Republic City's Metalbending Police Force, though it is more luxurious in appearance. The vessel is constructed primarily from metal and employs multiple propeller sets to move. It is unique in its impressive size: a flying bison is capable of comfortably staying on board with little-to-no effect on its speed. The size of the ship also allows the passengers to travel in comfort as it sports an impressive galley with high ceilings and a deck atop the ship with enough room for two airbenders to duel without much risk of falling overboard. The bow features a phoenix statue mounted on it.
